text: Austin Reed Dillon (born April 27, 1990) is a professional NASCAR driver. He currently drives the No. 3 Chevrolet Camaro for Richard Childress Racing in the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series. In addition, he also drives the No. 10 Camaro for Kaulig Racing in the NASCAR Xfinity Series. == References == Category:1990 births Category:NASCAR drivers Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina Category:Living people
title: Austin Dillon
